PropertyList.title: Fiat G.91R

key.name: d
key.desc: Activate the yaw and pitch damper

key.name: D
key.desc: disactivate the yaw and pitch damper

PropertyList.text: For flaps etc. see also common aircraft keys in the official FG manual (https://flightgear.gitlab.io/getstart/release-2024.1/en/HTML/getstart-ench5.html#keyboard-controls).
